article.headline: Southern U. 64, Texas Southern 55
article.story: HOUSTON (AP) -- Deforrest Riley-Smith scored 15 points to help lead Southern to a 64-55 victory over Texas Southern on Thursday night. Joseph Jack, Geri Guillory and Steffon Wiley each scored 10 points for Southern (9-20, 8-9 Southwestern Athletic). Chris Moore had 19 points and 16 rebounds to lead Texas Southern (13-15, 9-8). Sollie Norwood added 13 points and Stpaul Latham scored 12. Only two other players scored for Texas Southern. Texas Southern jumped out to a 7-0 lead but Southern then went on a 9-2 run to tie the game at 9-9 on a jumper by Riley-Smith with 14:15 left in the first half. Guillory's layup with 12:56 left gave Southern the lead for good. Southern shot 39 percent from the field while Texas Southern shot 33 percent. Southern led 34-20 at the half.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
